title: Didnt get LP on ranked win
body: I won a game today as twitch adc and i clicked "skip waiting for stats" because it was taking a while and when i looked at my profile i was still at 48 lp plus it doesn't show the grade i earned like all the other games do, and since I've been on a win loss pattern I've been keeping track on how much lp i have after each game, is there anything that can be done??

replies.body: Other than waiting for that game to properly be recorded, there's sadly not a lot we can do. The only reason that LP hasn't shown up yet is most likely due to the delay of the game being recorded properly.
